caption.p: Difference of ERA-Interim annual mean surface freshwater flux and its components averaged over 2000–2015 from 1990–1999. ( a) Evaporation – Precipitation (mm yr −1), ( b) Evaporation (mm yr −1) and ( c) Precipitation (mm yr −1). The black outline shows the south-eastern Mediterranean box used to determine the time series shown in Fig. 4.
